lines.text: The oxen are slow, but the earth is patient.
Which one of you boys would like the honour of loaning me an airplane.
The RAF would be proud to loan Miss Tozer an aircraft.

[Blows him a kiss]
I'll have it back in two weeks!
Oh wait a minute, I thought you meant just for the night. Sorry.
[Silence]
Anyone Else?
[Pause]
No more heroes? So long boys.
You wrecked my plane!
It was always a wreck!
You will be my welcome guests for dinner
Is he going to eat us or feed us?
Look at my Dorothy!
Hey, ace, would you do me a little favor, please?
Yeah, sure.
Just remember that, uh, remember the - the ox is slow, but the earth is patient.
[last lines]
You know, I only made one real mistake.
What was that?
I should have sold you when I had the chance.
